data.name: BOMJTOWN
data.detailed_description:
The game is a novel in a remote Soviet village.
The game is packed with humor, so you will have fun playing it.
To start the game, you are shown a description of the chapter.
Then you start a dialogue with people.
It is important to carefully read the dialogues to choose the correct answer,
there may be several of them. To select the answer, control the arrows and press enter.
Maybe sometimes you make a mistake, it's okay, the game will start again.

- Cool atmosphere
- Cool music
- Stylish design
- Pixel graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Dual Core 2
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse
